00052 // ===========================================================================
00053 // method definitions

00055 RORouteDef_Complete::RORouteDef_Complete(const std::string& id,
00056         const RGBColor* const color,
00057         const std::vector<const ROEdge*> &edges,
00058         bool tryRepair)
00059     : RORouteDef(id, color), myEdges(edges), myTryRepair(tryRepair) {
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00063 RORouteDef_Complete::~RORouteDef_Complete() {}
00064 
00065 
00066 RORoute*
00067 RORouteDef_Complete::buildCurrentRoute(SUMOAbstractRouter<ROEdge, ROVehicle> &router,
00068                                        SUMOTime begin, const ROVehicle& veh) const {
00069     if (myTryRepair) {
00070         const std::vector<const ROEdge*> &oldEdges = myEdges;
00071         if (oldEdges.size() == 0) {
00072             MsgHandler* m = OptionsCont::getOptions().getBool("ignore-errors") ? MsgHandler::getWarningInstance() : MsgHandler::getErrorInstance();
00073             m->inform("Could not repair empty route of vehicle '" + veh.getID() + "'.");
00074             return new RORoute(myID, 0, 1, std::vector<const ROEdge*>(), copyColorIfGiven());
00075         }
00076         std::vector<const ROEdge*> newEdges;
00077         newEdges.push_back(*(oldEdges.begin()));
00078         for (std::vector<const ROEdge*>::const_iterator i = oldEdges.begin() + 1; i != oldEdges.end(); ++i) {
00079             if ((*(i - 1))->isConnectedTo(*i)) {
00080                 newEdges.push_back(*i);
00081             } else {
00082                 std::vector<const ROEdge*> edges;
00083                 router.compute(*(i - 1), *i, &veh, begin, edges);
00084                 if (edges.size() == 0) {
00085                     return 0;
00086                 }
00087                 std::copy(edges.begin() + 1, edges.end(), back_inserter(newEdges));
00088             }
00089         }
00090         if (myEdges != newEdges) {
00091             WRITE_WARNING("Repaired route of vehicle '" + veh.getID() + "'.");
00092         }
00093         myEdges = newEdges;
00094     }
00095     SUMOReal costs = router.recomputeCosts(myEdges, &veh, begin);
00096     if (costs < 0) {
00097         throw ProcessError("Route '" + getID() + "' (vehicle '" + veh.getID() + "') is not valid.");
00098     }
00099     return new RORoute(myID, 0, 1, myEdges, copyColorIfGiven());
00100 }
00101 
00102 
00103 void
00104 RORouteDef_Complete::addAlternative(SUMOAbstractRouter<ROEdge, ROVehicle> &,
00105                                     const ROVehicle* const, RORoute* current, SUMOTime begin) {
00106     myStartTime = begin;
00107     myEdges = current->getEdgeVector();
00108     delete current;
00109 }
00110 
00111 
00112 RORouteDef*
00113 RORouteDef_Complete::copy(const std::string& id) const {
00114     return new RORouteDef_Complete(id, copyColorIfGiven(), myEdges, myTryRepair);
00115 }
00116 
00117 
00118 OutputDevice&
00119 RORouteDef_Complete::writeXMLDefinition(SUMOAbstractRouter<ROEdge, ROVehicle> &router,
00120                                         OutputDevice& dev, const ROVehicle* const veh,
00121                                         bool asAlternatives, bool withExitTimes) const {
00122     // (optional) alternatives header
00123     if (asAlternatives) {
00124         dev.openTag("routeDistribution") << " last=\"0\">\n";
00125     }
00126     // the route
00127     dev.openTag("route");
00128     if (asAlternatives) {
00129         dev << " cost=\"" << router.recomputeCosts(myEdges, veh, veh->getDepartureTime());
00130         dev << "\" probability=\"1.00\"";
00131     }
00132     if (myColor != 0) {
00133         dev << " color=\"" << *myColor << "\"";
00134     }
00135     dev << " edges=\"" << myEdges;
00136     if (withExitTimes) {
00137         SUMOReal time = STEPS2TIME(veh->getDepartureTime());
00138         dev << "\" exitTimes=\"";
00139         std::vector<const ROEdge*>::const_iterator i = myEdges.begin();
00140         for (; i != myEdges.end(); ++i) {
00141             if (i != myEdges.begin()) {
00142                 dev << " ";
00143             }
00144             time += (*i)->getTravelTime(veh, (SUMOTime) time);
00145             dev << time;
00146         }
00147     }
00148     (dev << "\"").closeTag(true);
00149     // (optional) alternatives end
00150     if (asAlternatives) {
00151         dev.closeTag();
00152     }
00153     return dev;
00154 }
